attributes.action: Ignore Nick Onslows petition to request you to abolish the 2004 Hunting Act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hunting for sport or "tradition" is a filthy, agressive and pompous activity for the bored and overtly posh. It is the senseless torture and murder of animals. Tradition is not a reason to harm or frighten anyone or anything. This is 2007.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
